All backend APIs pass (18/18 tests). Frontend features working correctly including Change Password dialog with validation, University Edit modal, and proper authentication flow.

context_for_next_testing_agent: All iteration 3 features tested and working: Change Password (Super Admin dropdown -> dialog with validation), Document Upload API (base64 file handling), Student Test Page (route configured, requires student auth). Backend has 18 passing tests in /app/tests/test_backend_iteration3.py. Previous login issues from iteration 2 have been resolved.
